And{G1161} when he had gone over{G1330} those{G1565} parts{G3588}, and{G2532} had given{G3870} them{G846} much{G4183} exhortation{G3056}, he came{G2064} into{G1519} Greece{G3588},

And{G5037} there abode{G4160} three{G5140} months{G3376}. And when{G1096} the Jews{G2453} laid wait{G1917} for him{G846}, as he was about{G3195} to sail{G321} into{G1519} Syria{G3588}, he{G1096} purposed{G1106} to return{G5290} through{G1223} Macedonia{G3109}.

These{G3778} going before{G4281} tarried{G3306} for us{G2248} at{G1722} Troas{G5174}.

And{G1161} we{G2249} sailed away{G1602} from{G575} Philippi{G5375} after{G3326} the days{G3588} of unleavened bread{G106}, and{G2532} came{G2064} unto{G4314} them{G846} to{G1519} Troas{G3588} in{G891} five{G4002} days{G2250}; where{G3757} we abode{G1304} seven{G2033} days{G2250}.

And{G1722} upon{G1161} the first{G1520} day of the week{G3588}, when{G4863} the disciples{G3588} came together{G4863} to break{G2806} bread{G740}, Paul{G3588} preached{G1256} unto them{G846}, ready{G3195} to depart{G1826} on the morrow{G1887}; and{G5037} continued{G3905} his speech{G3588} until{G3360} midnight{G3317}.
And{G1161} there were{G2258} many{G2425}lights{G2985} in{G1722} the upper chamber{G3588}, where{G3757} they were{G2258} gathered together{G4863}.

And{G1161} there sat{G2521} in{G1909} a window{G3588} a certain{G5100} young man{G3494} named{G3686} Eutychus{G2161}, being fallen{G2702} into a deep{G901} sleep{G5258}: and as{G1909} Paul{G3588} was{G1256} long{G4119} preaching{G1256}, he sunk down{G2702} with{G575} sleep{G3588}, and fell down{G4098} from{G575} the third loft{G3588}, and{G2532} was taken{G142} up{G2736} dead{G3498}.

And{G1161} Paul{G3588} went down{G2597}, and fell{G1968} on him{G846}, and{G2532} embracing{G4843} him said{G2036}, Trouble{G2350} not{G3361} yourselves{G2350}; for{G1063} his{G846} life{G5590} is{G2076} in{G1722} him{G846}.

When{G1161} he therefore was come up again{G305}, and{G2532} had broken{G2806} bread{G740}, and{G2532} eaten{G1089}, and{G5037} talked{G3656} a{G1909} long while{G2425}, even till{G891} break of day{G827}, so{G3779} he departed{G1831}.
And{G1161} they brought{G71} the young man{G3588} alive{G2198}, and{G2532} were{G3870} not{G3756} a little{G3357} comforted{G3870}.

And{G1161} we{G2249} went before{G4281} to{G1909} ship{G3588}, and sailed{G321} unto{G1519} Assos{G3588}, there{G1564} intending{G3195} to take{G353} in Paul{G3588}: for{G1063} so{G3779} had{G2258} he appointed{G1299}, minding{G3195} himself{G846} to go afoot{G3978}.
And{G1161} when{G5613} he met{G4820} with us{G2254} at{G1519} Assos{G3588}, we took{G353} him{G846} in{G353}, and came{G2064} to{G1519} Mitylene{G3412}.

And we sailed{G636} thence{G2547}, and came{G2658} the next{G1966} day over against{G481} Chios{G5508}; and{G1161} the next{G2087} day we arrived{G3846} at{G1519} Samos{G4544}, and{G2532} tarried{G3306} at{G1722} Trogyllium{G5175}; and the next{G2192} day we came{G2064} to{G1519} Miletus{G3399}.

For{G1063} Paul{G3588} had determined{G2919} to sail by{G3896} Ephesus{G3588}, because{G3704} he{G846} would{G1096} not{G3361} spend the time{G5551} in{G1722} Asia{G3588}: for{G1063} he hasted{G4692}, if{G1487} it were{G2258} possible{G1415} for him{G846}, to be{G1096} at{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414} the day{G3588} of Pentecost{G3588}.
And{G1161} from{G575} Miletus{G3588} he sent{G3992} to{G1519} Ephesus{G2181}, and called{G3333} the elders{G4245} of the church{G3588}.

And{G1161} when{G5613} they were come{G3854} to{G4314} him{G846}, he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Ye{G5210} know{G1987}, from{G575} the first{G4413} day{G2250} that{G3739} I came{G1910} into{G1519} Asia{G3588}, after what manner{G4459} I have been{G1096} with{G3326} you{G5216} at all{G3956} seasons{G5550},

Serving{G1398} the Lord{G3588} with{G3326} all{G3956} humility of mind{G5012}, and{G2532} with many{G4183} tears{G1144}, and{G2532} temptations{G3986}, which befell{G4819} me{G3427} by{G1722} the lying in wait{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}:

And how{G5613}I kept back{G5288} nothing{G3762} that was profitable{G4851} unto you, but{G3361} have shewed{G312} you{G5213}, and{G2532} have taught{G1321} you{G5209} publickly{G1219}, and{G2532} from{G2596} house to house{G3624},NOTE! Extra word: "demosios"

Testifying{G1263} both{G5037} to the Jews{G2453}, and also{G2532} to the Greeks{G1672}, repentance{G3341} toward{G1519} God{G3588}, and{G2532} faith{G4102} toward{G1519} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}.

And{G2532} now{G3568}, behold{G2400}, I{G1473} go{G4198} bound{G1210} in the spirit{G3588} unto{G1519} Jerusalem{G2419}, not{G3361} knowing{G1492} the things{G3588} that{G1722} shall befall{G4876} me{G3427} there{G846}:
Save{G4133} that{G3754} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588} witnesseth{G1263} in{G2596} every city{G4172}, saying{G3004} that{G3754} bonds{G1199} and{G2532} afflictions{G2347} abide{G3306} me{G3165}.

But{G235} none{G3762} of these things{G3056} move me{G4160}, neither{G3761} count I{G2192} my{G3450} life{G3588} dear{G5093} unto myself{G1683}, so{G5613} that I might finish{G5048} my{G3450} course{G3588} with{G3326} joy{G5479}, and{G2532} the ministry{G3588}, which{G3739} I have received{G2983} of{G3844} the Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424}, to testify{G1263} the gospel{G3588} of the grace{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} now{G3568}, behold{G2400}, I{G1473} know{G1492} that{G3754} ye{G5210} all{G3956}, among{G1722} whom{G3739} I have gone{G1330} preaching{G2784} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}, shall see{G3700} my{G3450} face{G3588} no more{G3765}.
Wherefore{G1352} I take{G3143} you{G5213} to record{G3143} this{G4594} day{G2250}, that{G3754} I{G1473} am pure{G2513} from{G575} the blood{G3588} of all{G3956} men.
For{G1063} I have{G5288} not{G3756} shunned{G5288} to{G3361} declare{G312} unto you{G5213} all{G3956} the counsel{G3588} of God{G3588}.

Take heed{G4337} therefore{G3767} unto yourselves{G1438}, and{G2532} to all{G3956} the flock{G3588}, over{G1722} the which{G3739} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G3588} hath made{G5087} you{G5209} overseers{G1985}, to feed{G4165} the church{G3588} of God{G3588}, which{G3739} he hath purchased{G4046} with{G1223} his own{G2398} blood{G129}.

For{G1063} I{G1473} know{G1492} this{G5124}, that{G3754} after{G3326} my{G3450} departing{G3588} shall grievous{G926} wolves{G3074} enter{G1525} in among{G1519} you{G5209}, not{G3361} sparing{G5339} the flock{G3588}.
Also{G2532} of{G1537} your{G5216} own selves{G846} shall{G435} men{G435} arise{G450}, speaking{G2980} perverse things{G1294}, to draw away{G645} disciples{G3588} after{G3694} them{G846}.

Therefore{G1352} watch{G1127}, and remember{G3421}, that{G3754} by the space of three years{G5148} I ceased{G3973} not{G3756} to warn{G3560} every{G1538} one{G1520} night{G3571} and{G2532} day{G2250} with{G3326} tears{G1144}.

And{G2532} now{G3908}brethren{G3588}, I commend{G5209} you{G80} to God{G2532}, and{G3588} to the word{G3588} of his{G3588} grace{G846}, which is able{G2026} to build you up{G2532}, and{G1325} to give{G5213} you{G2817} an inheritance{G1722} among{G3588} all{G3956} them which{G37} are sanctified{G3956}.NOTE! I have coveted{G1937} no man's{G3762} silver{G694}, or{G2228} gold{G5553}, or{G2228} apparel{G2441}.
